participant_1.background:
My biggest fear is not being able to provide for my family.
i am from france.
I've never been to the west coast, but I really want to go.
i m a older woman.
I love to go paddle boarding with my friends because it's a fun and active way to spend time together

participant_2.background:
Music is my way to relax and enjoy my time with friends.
i sing in the shower.
i get paid over 5 million a year to dribble a ball.
my wife is a college professor.
regular life disappoints me.

content.text: Not being able to provide for my family.
I can understand that, I guess everyone wants the best for their family.
Yeah, it is important to be there for the people who matter.
I am from France, and I have never been to the West Coast, have you?
I have, it is beautiful. I love to go paddle boarding with my friends there.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I have never been paddle boarding before, but it sounds like something I would enjoy.
It is great, it is a fun and active way to spend time with friends.
That is awesome. I am glad you have found something you enjoy doing.
Thanks, I try to find things that I enjoy doing, it helps to make life more enjoyable.
I agree, it is important to have things that you enjoy doing.
Yeah, it makes life more fun.
